L7p:value.stringValue: Evalua si el estado de la respuesta es OK

L7p:Detail.stringValue: REQUESTID: ${requestId} | EVENTID: ${request.http.parameter.header.consumerId} | APIM ${service.name} Route OK | IS STATUS: ${httpRouting.reasonCode} | IS URI: ${httpRouting.url} | IS REQUEST: ${message.mainpart} | IS RESPONSE: ${response.mainpart} | TIMESTAMP: ${request.time.local.yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS}

REQUESTID: ${requestId} | EVENTID: ${request.http.parameter.header.consumerId} | APIM ${service.name} Route Failed | IS STATUS: ${httpRouting.reasonCode} | IS URI: ${httpRouting.url} | IS REQUEST: ${message.mainpart} | IS RESPONSE: ${response.mainpart} | TIMESTAMP: ${request.time.local.yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS}
